Demon Days - Instrumentals
-------------------------
Ripped by The Gorillaz Archive
http://The-Gorillaz-Archive.tumblr.com
The songs in this folder are ripped from the rare "Demon Days - Instrumentals" CDr. These are 100% CDDA quality.
You are free to do what ever you want with these songs so long as it's legal. Ironic I know.
If you're wondering why "Don't Get Lost In Heaven" is not in the list, That's because it is not on the CD. Same for "Intro"
If you want to reupload these somewhere else like another file hosting service or torrent, go ahead but do not alter anything unless there is some sort of typo (I'm not perfect okay). Be sure to let people know where the songs came from.
I do not recommend reuploading these as MP3 because MP3 is garbage. Anyone who needs these as MP3 can do it themselves.
To play the FLACs, use a media player like Foobar2000. It also has a format converter.
Note for anyone using these for DJing:
If you plan on using these instrumentals to create a cappellas, Good luck. The mastering for the instrumentals do not match the final song so most a cappella creation techniques will not work.
I have not altered these songs in anyway. All I have done is add the metadata.
The front cover art is created by me. Just a quick ten minute job in Photoshop.
The back cover art is a recreation of the back of the CD case because I couldn't scan it properly and all the pictures online were too low-res.
The CD picture is a scan from my CD.
All credits to The Gorillaz Archive. I only uploaded again because The Gorillaz Archive Tumblr has been deleted.
© EMI MusicResources
